EmailVerification.title: Account created successfully!
EmailVerification.description: Check your email to activate your account.
EmailVerification.emailSent: A verification email has been sent to the following address:
EmailVerification.clickLink: Please click on the link in the email to activate your account.
EmailVerification.resendError: Failed to resend verification email. Please try again later.

PasswordForgetCard.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address to receive a reset link.
PasswordForgetCard.emailSentDescription: If the email address you entered is associated with an account, you will shortly receive an email to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
PasswordForgetCard.resetEmailError: An error occurred while sending the reset email.

PasswordResetCard.resetError: An error occurred while resetting the password.
PasswordResetCard.resetCompleteDescription: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.

SigninCard.signinError: An error occurred during sign in.
SigninCard.signinCompleteDescription: You are now signed in to your account.
SigninCard.twoFactorDescription: Please enter the code generated by your authentication app.
SigninCard.invalidOtp: The code must contain exactly six digits.

SignupCard.signupDescription: Create an account using your email and password

ProfileInfoUpdate.title: Edit Your Data
ProfileInfoUpdate.description: Here you can edit the information associated with your account.
ProfileInfoUpdate.emailUpdateInstructions: A confirmation email has been sent to your old address. Please follow the instructions to confirm the change.
ProfileInfoUpdate.emailChangeDescription: Verify your identity to validate the request
ProfileInfoUpdate.emailChangeSent: To secure the modification of your email address, we need to verify your identity. An email has been sent to your current address:
ProfileInfoUpdate.emailChangeClickLink: Please click on the link in the email to validate your request.
ProfileInfoUpdate.emailVerificationTitle: Verification of your new email address
ProfileInfoUpdate.emailVerificationDescription: Verify your new address to finalize the request
ProfileInfoUpdate.emailVerificationSent: Thank you for confirming your identity. To finalize the change of your email address, you will find an email in your new address:
ProfileInfoUpdate.emailVerificationClickLink: Please click on the link in the email to finalize your request.
ProfileInfoUpdate.resetPasswordLink: I want to reset my password

TwoFactorAuthToggle.passwordNeed: Please enter your password to continue
TwoFactorAuthToggle.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
TwoFactorAuthToggle.description: Secure your account with two-factor authentication
TwoFactorAuthToggle.stepOne: Step 1/2: Scan the QR Code or enter the secret into your authentication app.
TwoFactorAuthToggle.codeInstruction: Copy this code if you cannot scan the QR Code
TwoFactorAuthToggle.stepTwo: Step 2/2: Enter the code provided by your authentication app.
